title: Project Pulse - ERP
summary: Highly Customised ERP Solution with HRMS, CRM, and Project Management.
description: Built Highly Customised ERP Solution with HRMS, CRM, and Project Management.
Integrated Google SSO with Gmail and Google Calendar.
Web Push Notifications implemented with Server-Sent Events.
Integrated Firebase for Mobile Push Notifications.

title: HRDirect - HRMS
summary: Human Resource Management System, with Attendance Management and Payroll Services.
description: New HRDirect API server built using MCS (Model-Controller-Services) Structure.
Optimized MongoDB Queries and API logic for faster API responses.
Implemented Okta, Google & Microsoft SSO for various clients of HRDirect.
Implemented APIs from Google & Microsoft to retrieve emails and calendar information of user for various clients of HRDirect.
Integrated APIs from ZKTECO Biotime for attendance retrival.

title: SSOMatrix
summary: NPM package for Single Sign On integration for Google and Microsoft Providers.
description: Built a In-house NPM package to simplify SSO implementations for development teams for various clients.
Implemented Google and Microsoft OAuth Providers.
Modular and easy to integrate into any project.
